item.title: 317 delta ::toggleyell command^^
item.dc:creator: @the_king_erik the king erik
item.description:
@the_king_erik wrote:

1, open your client.java
then paste this command to the other commands:

if(command.startsWith("toggleyell") && playerRights > 2) {//meanst the command u have to use in the server is ::toggleyell and its just for admin or higher server.Yell=server.Yell?false:true;//turns yell command offline if its online and it turns it online if its offline if(server.Yell == true) {//if its getting turned on by using ::toggleyell its yelling the message from the next line. yell("" +playerName+ ": turned yell on."); return; } else {//if its getting turned off by using ::toggleyell its yelling the message from the next line. yell("" +playerName+ ": turned yell off."); return; } }

2, add && server.Yell == true)
into your ::yell command!
so it should look something like this if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && server.Yell == true) {

3, open server.java and add public static boolean Yell = true; public static boolean lockyell; it to the other “public static boolean’s”
4, save everything and compile the server

Read full topic
